data.title: Demon Slayer season 3 release schedule: When is episode 11 airing?
data.meta_description: Demon Slayer season 3, episode 11 release date in the US and UK, plus a look at the Swordsmith Village finale
data.text:
It's official: Demon Slayer season 3, episode 11 is the finale of the Swordsmith Village arc. With the seemingly never-ending battle between the Hashira and Upper Ranks coming to a close, it's time for us all to get prepared for the new episode to drop this Sunday.

With that in mind, we've got the Demon Slayer season 3, episode 11 release date and streaming time in both the US and UK. Crunchyroll and Funimation subscribers could find the goods, as well as talk of the English dubbed release, below.

If you're playing catch-up, here's our guide on how to watch Demon Slayer in order. While you wait, check out the best anime you should be watching right now, as well as our guide on how to watch Pokemon in order.

What time is Demon Slayer season 3, episode 11 releasing on Crunchyroll?

Update: Crunchyroll servers are currently down. There's no update on when the new episode will be available, but keep checking Crunchyroll's social media accounts for up-to-date info. As per the streamer: "Our team is aware and is working to fix the situation as soon as possible.

The Demon Slayer season 3, episode 11 release date is Sunday, June 18 at 10.45am Pacific/1.45pm Eastern in the US for subscribers on Crunchyroll and Funimation. That's 6.45pm BST in the UK. It's an extended episode, so be sure to block out part of your Sunday if you want to watch it all.

The English dubbed version of episode 11 isn't likely to appear until early-mid August as it's currently around two months behind on Crunchyroll.

Where to watch Demon Slayer season 3

Demon Slayer season 3 is only available to watch on Crunchyroll and Funimation. The first two seasons are available to stream on Netflix and Hulu.

Demon Slayer season 3 release schedule: how many episodes are there?

There are 11 episodes in Demon Slayer season 3, the same as the previous season's Entertainment DIstrict arc.

The first 10 episodes of Demon Slayer season 3 have been released. The rest of the schedule looks like this.

Demon Slayer season 3, episode 1 (AKA Swordsmith Village episode 1): April 9, 2023 - out now!

Demon Slayer season 3, episode 2 (AKA Swordsmith Village episode 2): April 16, 2023 - out now!

Demon Slayer season 3, episode 3 (AKA Swordsmith Village episode 3): April 23, 2023 - out now!

Demon Slayer season 3, episode 4 (AKA Swordsmith Village episode 4): April 30, 2023 - out now!

Demon Slayer season 3, episode 5 (AKA Swordsmith Village episode 5): May 7, 2023 - out now!

Demon Slayer season 3, episode 6 (AKA Swordsmith Village episode 6): May 14, 2023 - out now!

Demon Slayer season 3, episode 7 (AKA Swordsmith Village episode 7): May 21, 2023 - out now!

Demon Slayer season 3, episode 8 (AKA Swordsmith Village episode 8): May 28, 2023 - out now!

Demon Slayer season 3, episode 9 (AKA Swordsmith Village episode 9): June 4, 2023 - out now!

Demon Slayer season 3, episode 10 (AKA Swordsmith Village episode 10): June 11, 2023 - out now!

Demon Slayer season 3, episode 11 (AKA Swordsmith Village episode 11): June 18, 2023
